creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black textile decorated with multicolored embroidery and appliqué; embroidered devices include floral and bird motifs; jacket open at front; geometric appliquéd design decorates jacket's open front; embroidered decorations found at sleeves, sides, collar, and back; inner lining of jacket is blue
title: Jacket
